description: Standard infrastructure deployment workflow (Architecture → Engineering → Testing → Deployment)

frame.description: Frame: Fetch work item, classify infrastructure change type

steps.name: classify-change
steps.description: Classify infrastructure change type (new, update, migration)

steps.name: setup-env
steps.description: Create infrastructure branch and setup environment

steps.name: analyze-requirements
steps.prompt: Analyze requirements: review issue details, identify infrastructure components, determine hosting platform (AWS/GCP/Azure)

steps.name: design-architecture
steps.description: Design infrastructure architecture and generate design document
steps.prompt: Design architecture: create infrastructure diagram, define resource hierarchy, plan networking, document security model

steps.name: generate-iac
steps.description: Generate Terraform code from architecture design
steps.prompt: Generate Terraform code: translate architecture into IaC, follow naming conventions, implement resource dependencies, add documentation

steps.name: configure-backend
steps.description: Configure Terraform backend and state management

steps.name: commit-code
steps.description: Commit infrastructure code with semantic message
steps.prompt: Create commit with type 'feat' for new infrastructure or 'refactor' for updates, include infrastructure scope

evaluate.description: Evaluate: Validate, test, and audit infrastructure code

steps.name: validate-terraform
steps.description: Validate Terraform configuration syntax and structure
steps.prompt: Run terraform validate, check syntax, verify module references, validate variable definitions

steps.name: fix-issues
steps.description: Fix issues identified in validation and testing
steps.prompt: Address validation errors, fix security vulnerabilities, optimize costs if needed, then re-run validation

release.description: Release: Plan, review, and deploy infrastructure changes

steps.name: generate-plan
steps.prompt: Run terraform plan, capture resource changes, identify potential risks, estimate deployment time

steps.name: review-plan
steps.prompt: Review terraform plan output: verify expected changes, check for unintended deletions, confirm resource dependencies

steps.name: create-pr
steps.description: Create pull request documenting infrastructure changes
steps.prompt: Create PR with infrastructure changes summary, deployment plan output, cost impact, rollback plan

pre_architect.name: infrastructure-standards
pre_architect.description: Load infrastructure design standards and naming conventions

post_architect.name: cost-policy
post_architect.description: Review cost policies and budget constraints

post_release.name: notify-ops-team
post_release.description: Notify operations team of infrastructure deployment

autonomy.description: Guarded mode - pauses before infrastructure deployment for approval (recommended for production)
